alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:38PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Montgomery, southern San Jacinto, southwestern Liberty and northeastern Harris Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 437 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roman Forest, or near Kingwood, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Humble, Kingwood, Splendora, Patton Village, Roman Forest, Woodbranch, Plum Grove, Lake Houston, northern Atascocita, Porter and New Caney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; San Jacinto
